function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to essential services such as water and space","Impact":"Inability to practice recommended hygiene and physical distancing measures","Mitigation":"Improving access to essential services in informal settlements","Technologies":"Water purification systems, space optimization technology","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Limited availability of accurate and timely information about COVID-19","Impact":"Misunderstanding of risks and appropriate preventive measures","Mitigation":"Dissemination of accurate and timely information through community outreach and education","Technologies":"Information technology for communication, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Unequal distribution of resources and access to healthcare based on income levels","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of low-income individuals to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of resources and access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics","People":"Low-income individuals and communities","Owner":"Government, health organizations"}]}
